metadata.title: Product Agility Transformation Delivers $4.6M Annual Savings
metadata.overview: A large organization struggled with four failed transformations over a decade before Eliassen's custom Product Agility approach delivered $4.6M in annual cost savings and reduced time-to-production from months to 2 weeks. Our integrated methodology of Product Dojos, Enterprise Coaching, and custom frameworks enabled 1.5 million new customer accounts in under 18 months.

email.subject: How We Delivered $4.6M Annual Savings Through Product Agility
email.body:
Many organizations struggle with product transformation initiatives that fail to deliver sustainable results. After four unsuccessful attempts over a decade, one of our clients was facing slow delivery cycles, limited innovation focus, and ineffective product management practices.

Our Enterprise Agility team developed a custom approach that combined Product Dojos, Enterprise Coaching, and technical enablement to create measurable transformation. Rather than implementing another off-the-shelf framework, we co-created an Adaptable Discovery Framework integrated with a custom Agile Delivery System.

The results were transformative:
• $4.6M in annual cost savings through optimized processes
• Reduced time-to-production from several months to 2 weeks
• 10% decrease in attrition rate
• 1.5 million new customer accounts generated in under 18 months
• 80% of product teams implementing automated testing

This success came from addressing the root causes of previous failures and building sustainable internal capability rather than relying on external dependency.

Would you be open to a 20-minute conversation to discuss how a similar approach could address your product development challenges?

key_talking_points: Lead with the $4.6M annual savings achieved through product agility transformation
Emphasize that this client had four previous failed transformation attempts
Highlight the dramatic improvement from months to 2 weeks time-to-production
Position our custom approach versus generic frameworks that often fail
evidence_point: Specific client achieved $4.6M in annual cost savings
Reduced delivery time from several months to 2 weeks for customer-facing solutions
Generated 1.5 million new customer accounts in under 18 months
Decreased employee attrition by more than 10%
engagement_question: What challenges are you experiencing with your current product development velocity?
How long does it typically take your organization to get new features to market?
Have you attempted product or agile transformations before, and what were the results?
What's preventing your teams from delivering customer value more quickly?
voicemail: Hi, this is [name] from Eliassen Group's Enterprise Agility practice
We recently helped an organization achieve $4.6M in annual savings by transforming their product development approach
They reduced time-to-production from several months to just 2 weeks
I'd like to share how our custom methodology could apply to your situation - call me back at [number]

linkedin.connection_request: I help organizations transform product development to deliver faster customer value and measurable ROI. Would love to connect and share insights relevant to your product leadership role.
linkedin.inmessage_body:
Many product leaders face the challenge of slow delivery cycles and failed transformation initiatives. One of our recent clients had attempted four transformations over a decade with limited success.

Our Enterprise Agility team developed a custom Product Agility approach that delivered remarkable results:
• $4.6M in annual cost savings
• Reduced time-to-production from months to 2 weeks
• 1.5 million new customer accounts in 18 months

The key was moving beyond generic frameworks to create custom solutions that addressed their specific organizational challenges and built sustainable internal capability.

Would you be interested in a 25-minute discussion about how similar approaches could accelerate your product development outcomes?

objections.objection: We've already tried agile transformations and they didn't work
objections.response: That's exactly why this client chose us - they had four previous failed attempts. The difference is we don't implement generic frameworks. We co-create custom approaches that address your specific organizational challenges and build sustainable internal capability rather than external dependency.

objections.objection: Our industry/situation is too unique for standard agile approaches
objections.response: I completely understand that concern. This client felt the same way after multiple failures. That's precisely why we develop Adaptable Discovery Frameworks and custom delivery systems tailored to each organization's unique context, rather than forcing one-size-fits-all solutions.

objections.objection: We don't have budget for another transformation initiative right now
objections.response: This client achieved $4.6M in annual cost savings that more than justified the investment. We focus on identifying quick wins and measurable value early in the engagement. Many organizations find the cost of not transforming - through continued inefficiency and missed opportunities - far exceeds the investment in change.

objections.objection: Our teams are already too busy to take on a transformation
objections.response: This client's teams were overwhelmed with slow, inefficient processes taking months to deliver results. After transformation, they reduced time-to-production to 2 weeks, actually freeing up capacity for innovation. Our approach integrates transformation into daily work rather than adding separate overhead.

objections.objection: We need to see results quickly, not another long transformation
objections.response: Our approach is designed for rapid value delivery. This client saw measurable improvements in cycle time within weeks, not months. We focus on quick wins while building the foundation for sustainable long-term transformation, rather than lengthy theoretical initiatives.

collateral.title: Product Agility Transformation Case Study: $4.6M Annual ROI
